Thus, performing contact tracing on the individuals with high NCE-values should identify undiagnosed and highly infectious individuals and/or their undiagnosed descendants, and therefore efficiently reduce further disease spread. We refer to contact tracing based on NCE-value as phylogeny-guided contact tracing. We evaluate different threshold values m, i.e. where individuals who have NCE â©¾ m within t
